{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$1.8M in 2021-2022 on contracts with KANTER MARINE.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [KANTER MARINE INC.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22KANTER%20MARINE%20INC.%22)
- [Kanter Marine Inc.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Kanter%20Marine%20Inc.%22)
{{< /details >}}
